titleStmt.title: The preachers president, or, The master and scholler in a sermon preached at a synode holden by the Right Reuerend Father in God, Iohn, Lord Bishop of Chester, at Wigan in Lancashire, the 21 of Aprill, 1625 / by Iames Hyatt B. of D. and preachers of Gods Word at Liuer-poole.
titleStmt.author: Hyatt, James, fl. 1625.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
